text:
Halle Berry goes locations in summer time’s greatest outerwear pattern.

Earlier this week, the award-winning actress was noticed at JFK airport in New York, sporting a gold-tinted duster, boyfriend denims, a sheer-paneled high, ankle boots and a big backpack—the good summer time journey ensemble. Her loose-fitting high and bottoms ensures consolation, irrespective of the size of the journey. Her boots appear to be they’re made for strolling. And, her backpack looks like it may well carry the whole lot you would wish on a protracted flight—a laptop computer, good books, magnificence necessities, and so forth.

Her mastery of summer time journey comes right down to her satin duster, nevertheless. It is mild sufficient to hold round or put on to and from the airport in the summer time warmth. But, it’s going to additionally present heat if the passenger subsequent to you decides to show up all of the vents. Should you’re making an attempt to catch some Zzz’s, it will make a reasonably good impromptu pillow.
